DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate product performance Bausch & Lomb Multipurpose solution compare Alcon OptiFree Replenish Multipurpose Solution
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Performance Bausch & Lomb Multipurpose Solution Alcon OptiFree Replenish Multipurpose Solution
DOC.criteria: Subjects adapt wearer silicone hydrogel contact lenses VA correctable 0.3 LogMAR better ( drive vision ) Clear central cornea Subject use lens care system regular basis Systemic disease affect ocular health Using systemic topical medication wear monovision , multifocal toric contact lenses Any grade 2 great slit lamp finding
